html.DT_OD_PLACE_ORDER_AGREEMENT_CHECK: By clicking on 'Continue' below, you authorize us to charge the above indicated card (which you may edit) for the amount due today.
html.DT_OD_SECURE_PIN_VERIFICATION_CODE_DESC:
Now enter the code we just sent you.
If you don't get the code after a few minutes, have us send a new one.

label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_STORE_DETAIL_TITLE: Thanks. Looking forward to seeing you soon.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_MAIN_SCREEN_DEVICE_PAYMEN: I have read and agree to the Device Payment Agreement
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_PAYMENT_METHOD_DESCRIPTIO: Your billing ZIP Code has to be the same as the account ZIP Code.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_CONTACT_INFO_DESCRIP: We will send you an email when your order is ready.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_TC_HEADING: Please review the Terms & Conditions below.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_CUST_AGREE_NOTE: The market you're in determines taxes, surcharge and fees, such as E911 and gross receipt charges. As of December 1, 2015, they can add between 7% and 45% to your standard monthly access and other charges. Monthly Federal Universal Service (17.9% of the interstate and international telecom charges, as of April 1, 2016; varies quarterly based on FCC rate), Regulatory (18 cents per voice line, 2 cents per data only line) and Administrative ($1.23 per voice line, 6 cents per data only line) charges are Verizon Wireless charges, not taxes, and are subject to change. For more details on these charges, call 1-888-684-1888.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_CUST_AGREE_TEXT: I have read and agree to the Verizon Wireless Customer Agreement including, settlement of dispute by arbitration instead of jury trial, as well as the terms of my plan and optional services I have agreed to purchase.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_RETAIL_ACKNOWLEDGE: I acknowledge I have read the retail installment sales agreement for the purchased device and that a copy was made available by Verizon Wireless. I agree to all terms and conditions
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_EPP_READ_AGREEMENT_TEXT: I have read and agree to the

label.DT_OD_SECURITY_DEPOSIT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: Due to the nature of your account history, we need a security deposit, which will be returned after 1 year. Your deposit will be added to your order.
label.DT_OD_DOWN_PAYMENT_TITLE: Your down payment has decreased to
label.DT_OD_DOWN_PAYMENT_TITLE_DESCRIPTION: Great news, your account history is so good we're lowering to upfront costs. We do have to bump up the monthly costs to $21 a month.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_MISSING_CVC_SUB_TITLE_TEX: Before you can continue, we need you to confirm your payment by entering 3-digit CVV.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_CUSTOMER_AGREEMENT_TEXT: Review the My Verizon Wireless Customer Agreement
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ESTIMATED_TRADE_IN_DESCRI: Once you upgrade, we'll send a prepaid shipping box so you can mail your trade-in.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_SEND_OPT_IN_TEXT: Send me a text message when my order is ready.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_STORE_DETAILS_DESCRIPTION: When picking up the order, you'll need to bring your photo ID and the credit card used to make this purchase.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_NO_SEARCH_RESULTS_DE: Please try searching another location or select free 2-day shipping.

label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_DELIVERY_METHOD_VERIFICAT: Before you can edit your shipipng address, we need to authorize your account by sending you an authorization code.
label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_ISPU_ORDER_READY_TEXT: Orders are usually ready in about an hour.
label.DT_OD_CVV_DESCRIPTION_LABEL: CVV stands for Card Verification Value and is equivalent to Visa's CVV2 or Master card's CVC -  Both are important security features provided on the back of your credit/debit cards. This consists of the last three digits printed on the signature panel. Below is an example of a CVV2/CVC security features.

label.DT_OD_CHECKOUT_LEGAL_TEXT: The market you're in determines taxes, surcharge and fees, such as E911 and gross receipt charges. As of December 1, 2015, they can add between 7% and 45% to your standard monthly access and other charges. Monthly Federal Universal Service (17.9% of the interstate and international telecom charges, as of April 1, 2016; varies quarterly based on FCC rate), Regulatory (18 cents per voice line, 2 cents per data only line) and Administrative ($1.23 per voice line, 6 cents per data only line) charges are Verizon Wireless charges, not taxes, and are subject to change. For more details on these charges, call 1-888-684-1888.
